body:
By default the Intel compiler based MKL library is being used, this pull request modifies the Octave package to use the GNU based MKL library component, similarly to what was done for the R package at https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/8642

Speaking of this, it may be a good idea to do the same replacement for the PGI/Nvidia compiler, though, I presume that noone will be building Octave with PGI.
title: Allow octave to build with gfortran using MKL
